name: Elijah Collins III
description:
#officerinvolvedshooting  #Sugarcreekpolicedepartment #officerstabbedscrewdriver

SUGARCREEK, Ohio â€” The Sugarcreek Police Department --- A Sugarcreek Police Officer is recovering in an Akron hospital after being stabbed by a man during a traffic stop.

After being stabbed, 37-year-old Police Captain Brian Dalton shot and killed the male suspect. The incident took place around 10 a.m. Wednesday near TMK Farm Service in Tuscarawas County.

The motorist had reportedly driven through a no-trucks zone, damaging property. He allegedly stabbed Dalton in the neck with a screwdriver after the being told he would need to appear in court on a property damaging charge.

Police have identified the deceased male as Elijah Collins III, 32-years-old truck driver from High Point, N.C

Collins died of a gun shot injury according to the Tuscarawas Office of the Coroner. Dr. Cameron has released the name of the decedent involved in the incident in Sugarcreek.
